attributes.action: Make Car Insurance Cheaper For Younger Drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many young people are having to pay high amounts out on insurance on new cars. The cost of insurance for a first time driver is very high. 

Insurance companies are charging way too much for insurance and getting away with it.

A new car is costing young drivers too much which is not giving them the chance to buy new cars.

So please put a limit on car insurance so that your average young person can afford to run a car.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
